response: the importance of data protection has been recognized by many countries, including germany. the general data protection regulation (gdpr) was implemented in 2018 to give control over personal data back to individuals. this regulation requires companies to be transparent about the data they collect and how it is used. social media platforms must also comply with gdpr regulations. users have the right to access and delete their personal information, as well as decide who has access to it. additionally, social media users should exercise caution when sharing personal information online, and only share what they are comfortable with being made public.<|endoftext|>
